price: 46. como exhortador (a la obediencia) de Al-lah, con Su consentimiento, y como una brillante luz (para guiar a los hombres).
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
